ssot__Affiliation__dlm.name: Affiliation
ssot__Affiliation__dlm.description: The Affiliation DMO represents affiliation or how to map Marketing Cloud Engagement business unit use case data.

ssot__AffiliatedTo__c.description: Provides info about the business unit like brand or region. Tip: Default mapping is to a Marketing Cloud Engagement MID. This field ensures activations are sent to the right business unit.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the affiliation DMO.

ssot__AffiliationType__c.description: The type or category of the affiliation such as product category.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group. :::tip This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.:::
